snippet: The National Economic Council, advisers to the Obama administration, said in a report that Congressional tussles over raising the federal debt ceiling could harm the economy.
abstract: National Economic Council, advisers to the Obama administration, report that Congressional tussles over raising the federal debt ceiling could harm still-fragile economy; warns about the 'unnecessary threatening of default' in fall.
lead_paragraph: The National Economic Council, advisers to the Obama administration, said in a report that Congressional tussles over raising the federal debt ceiling could harm the economy.

headline.main: White House Warns Against Threats of Debt Default
headline.print_headline: White House Warns Against Threats of Debt Default
